__e: McCOY: Jim... Since you weren't in my exam room for your appointment 30 minutes ago...
I'd like to run an inner nuncial series on you. Can you walk?
Said you spent three months recovering in medical from those bullet wounds.
Let's go to the infirmary to show you.
I'd better get back to sickbay, see if there's any change.
One woman who had worked as a nurse sat, most days, in the nursing station, writing notes.
With the punch you took, you should ask see the doc. Maybe he'll give you something.
You just take the test, and then you tell them that you feel sick, and you go down to the nurse's office, and I'll come pick you up.
He's a, um... nurse in the infirmary. And, um, well, I don't know if you know this or not. But... um-.
